com.lexicalscope.jewel.cli.specification
Interface OptionSpecification

All Known Subinterfaces:
ParsedOptionSpecification, UnparsedOptionSpecification
public interface OptionSpecification

Specifies an Option BETA: unstable may change in future versions

Author:
t.wood

Get the default values which will be used if the option is not specified by the user.

Returns:
The default values which will be used if the option is not present

hasDefaultValue

boolean hasDefaultValue()
Is there a default value to use if this option is not present? Options with a default value are assumed to be optional.

Returns:
true iff this option has a default value

isHidden

boolean isHidden()
Is the option hidden from help messages?

Returns:
true iff the option is hidden from help messages

allowedThisManyValues

boolean allowedThisManyValues(int count)
Is the option allowed to have this many values?

Parameters:
count - the number of values that the option might have
Returns:
true iff the count is a valid number of values for this option
